meanings.definition: To make changes to something in order to improve or update it.
meanings.sent1: She remodifies her website regularly to keep it fresh and interesting.
meanings.sent2: The interior designer remodifies the living room to create a more modern look.
meanings.sent3: He remodifies his sandwich by adding extra cheese, making it even more delicious.
meanings.sent4: The artist remodifies reality in his paintings, adding vibrant colors and surreal elements.
meanings.sent5: The chef remodifies the traditional recipe, giving it a unique twist with exotic spices.

meanings.definition: To alter or adjust something in a new way.
meanings.sent1: The tailor remodifies the dress to fit the customer perfectly.
meanings.sent2: After feedback, the team remodifies their presentation to make it more engaging.
meanings.sent3: The mechanic remodifies the engine, making it run smoother than ever before.
meanings.sent4: She remodifies her workout routine, incorporating new exercises for better results.
meanings.sent5: The architect remodifies the building plans, adding a unique feature to the design.
